required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Multiple Ascending Dose Study of KBP-7072 in Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Single-blind, Placebo-controlled, Sequential Parallel-Group and Multiple Ascending Dose (MAD) Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of KBP-7072 in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: This is a randomized, single-blind, placebo-controlled, sequential parallel-group and multiple ascending dose (MAD) study to evaluate the safety, tolerability and pharmacokinetics of KBP 7072 in healthy subjects. The safety will be assessed at each dose level before progressing to the next higher dose.

primary_outcome.measure: Safety and tolerability (i.e., number of participants with adverse events, abnormal vital signs, clinical laboratory findings, 12-lead ECGs and physical examinations) in healthy subjects

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under Curve (AUC) in healthy subjects
secondary_outcome.description: on Day 1 (first dose): pre-dose (within 30 minutes prior to dosing) and 0.5, 1, 2, 4, 6, 10, 12, 18, and 24 hours post dose; on Days 4, 7, 8, and 9: pre-dose (within 30 minutes prior to dosing); on Day 10 (last dose): pre-dose (within 30 minutes prior to dosing) and 0.5, 1, 2, 4, 6, 10, 12, 18, 24, 48, 72, 96, 120, 144, and 168 hours post dose.

arm_group.description: Healthy Volunteers will receive multiple dose of KBP-7072 and placebo
Healthy Volunteers will receive multiple dose of KBP-7072 and placebo
Healthy Volunteers will receive multiple dose of KBP-7072 and placebo
Healthy Volunteers will receive multiple dose of KBP-7072 and placebo
